example.name: all arguments
example.text: He often groans , he says [0] [*T*-3] , at the `` clutter '' of sports stories about drugs , alcohol , gambling and some player 's lament `` about the miserly millions [0] he is offered [*-1] [*T*-2] [*-1] to play the game . ''

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The crowd groans , Mr. Jones shakes his head , the Cowboys lose the game .
